title: The Ryer Avenue Story: A Novel
description: A new novel of ringing authenticity and wringing emotion by the author of Law and Order and The Investigation. The story opens on a Bronx winter night in 1935, when a blow from a shovel kills a man. From the scene flee six children--any of whom might have loosed the fatal strike--whose lives 40 years later will be suddenly shattered by that night's events.
author: Dorothy Uhnak
